_header: From that the sun doth first ascend
_description: James Ryman, version of the hymn ‘A solis ortus cardine’ — five quatrains (aabb) and 4-line Latin burden

CULEe112.First Lines:
ffro that the sonne dothe first ascendeIn the east vnto the worldes
                    ende…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…with the fader and holygoostBothe thre & one of myghtes
                    moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 192-4.
